description.ko: 소금과 돌로 쓰인 역사의 지도, 모든 균열이 지구의 긴 기억에 대한 이야기를 들려줍니다.
description.en: A map of history written in salt and stone, where every crack tells a story of the earth's long memory.

prompt: A bird's-eye topographic view of an ancient river delta that has crystallized into a mosaic of cracked ochre clay and translucent salt deposits, with veins of oxidized copper running through the strata. Rough textures of rock, sediment layers, and weathered soil. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. The lighting mimics a low-angle sunset, casting long, dramatic shadows that reveal every geological fissure. Micro-displacement textures for every salt crystal and layer of sediment, rendered with global illumination to showcase the narrative of the land carved by eons.
